item.description:
Hello everyone. Our first meet up went well and we all decided we wanted to do it again soon rather than wait a whole month.

Please come and join us we would love to meet you. It was really a pleasure to be with everyone.

Here is the Blurb of what we do for all the new people who we have not met yet...

I want to introduce myself to you, my name is Reverend Gabrielle. I am a non- denominational mystical Christian priest. I have been meditating for over 14 years and taught yoga for a long time too. I am eager to meet others who are interested in meditation.

This will not be a christian based group but it will focus on learning skills to concentrate and relax so a connection can be made inside through quieting the mind and settling the feelings. Mysticism just means knowing through experience and what better way to experience God inside than through meditation.

The intention is to come together monthly for a Meditation and Mystical tea. This is what it will look like. We will start with a visualization or a short reading or subject to contemplate. After the meditation, we will discuss our experiences and talk about ways to deepen our practice.

I look forward to meeting you all and will be happy to see you there.

Oh yes, delicious tea will also be served.

In Light,
Rev Gabrielle
